about_the_game:
In a future world where civilization has been repeatedly reconstructed, you will play the role of a commander, using magical Portal Tower technology to explore the path of civilization in endless wars.

"Reserve Dyson Sphere: Portal Tower" is a "tower defense" game where you will use limited resources to break through opponents' overwhelming attacks, protect your own folding towers, and destroy their own tower.

The game is divided into two modes: level mode and rogue mode.

In level mode, you will gradually unlock 3 factions, totaling 18 different characters, to understand the characteristics of each faction and the restraint relationships between troops.

In rogue mode, with the help of "mercenaries", you will use powerful and rich buffs to defeat your opponents like a ragtag.However, even in a future full of waste, everything is not free. Every victory in battle will bring you wealth, so squander this wealth to enhance your character and buff list.

Finally, I wish you a pleasant time!

short_description: Reverse Dyson Sphere: Portal Tower is a Rogue attack tower defense. The game takes place in an elevated world called "Anti Dyson Ball". Here, you will guide the power of the Folding Tower, commanding different factions and unique characters in battle, defeating strong enemies with them.
